short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension provides a suite of time management and task management tools for personal and executive assistants in Getmagic.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Magic Extension offers a comprehensive suite of time and task management tools for personal and executive assistants, helping them stay organized and efficient. Track time spent on various tasks, monitor web activity, and enhance productivity with real-time data insights.
